P009491.project_name: Rural Roads and Markets Improvement and Maintenance Project

project_abstract.cdata: The Rural Roads and Markets Improvement and Maintenance Project supports rural development through developing rural infrastructure in eight districts in northwest Bangladesh at affordable standards. In addition, it supports strengthening the capacity of the districts and subdistricts to finance, execute and maintain roads and markets, repairing flood-damaged roads and reducing damage from future floods. The project comprises: (a) improvement, maintenance and upgrading of feeder roads; (b) construction of bridges and culverts on other rural roads; (c) improvement of common physical facilities; and (d) project support activities. It also includes: (e) support for construction of a new Dhaka headquarters building; (f) repair of roads, bridges, and municipal infrastructures; and (g) consultancy services.
